DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate whether Aggressive duplex surveillance vascular access surgery native vein hemodialysis increase maturation rate arteriovenous fistula . This study conduct single center , prospective , 1:1 randomize study . Enrolled patient randomize control group ( Physical exam 2 4 week surgery ) duplex group ( duplex study physical exam 2 4 week surgery ) . Maturation arteriovenous fistula evaluate 8 week surgery duplex patient .
